metadata.dc:author: Reid, A
Rivera, L
De la Luna, E
Salvador, J
metadata.dc:description: In this paper, the approach to the genesis of the acute hypertension of pregnancy, uses a conceptual and methodological perspective adjusted to its multifactorial nature; a set of questions with epidemiologic focus is proposed, in order to vinculate psychosocial factors with the biologic processes characteristic of this health problem.
metadata.dc:title: Un enfoque bio-psico-social de la enfermedad hipertensiva aguda del embarazo.
[A bio-psycho-social approach to acute hypertensive disease in pregnancy].
